description: Give the little ones a head start to their day with this healthier breakfast idea. They'll love this gooey eggy toast with vibrant tomato salsa.
name: Eggy Toasts With Fresh Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

HowToTip.tipText: Spread a little avocado or hummus on the leftover circles of bread to have as a snack.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a 5.5cm round cookie cutter, cut a hole in centres of bread slices (see Tip).

Lightly spray a large non-stick frying pan with oil, then place over medium-low heat. Cook bread for 3 minutes or until golden and toasted. Turn bread over. Crack an egg into centre of each slice. Cook for 8 minutes or until egg whites have just set.
Meanwhile, combine tomato and chives in a small bowl.
Serve eggy bread topped with tomato salsa.
